description: Paste your vibe, exhale, and ship. This deployable architecture turns raw HTML into a live static site on IBM Cloud Object Storage — optimized for ✨vibe-driven development✨.

variables.name: resource_group
variables.description: Where your vibe lives organizationally. If unsure, 'default' is a chill place to start.

variables.name: region
variables.description: Cosmic region for your bucket. us-south is a steady groove.

variables.name: cos_instance_name
variables.description: A friendly name for your IBM Cloud Object Storage instance. Don’t overthink it — the vibe is in the content.

variables.name: bucket_name
variables.description: Your public bucket name (lowercase, no spaces). This becomes the home of your vibe.

variables.name: index_html
variables.description: Paste your full HTML here — it becomes your app’s index.html when deployed. No escaping needed; just vibes.

variables.name: index_html_file
variables.description: Optional path to a local HTML file (e.g., index.html). Used only if the textarea above is empty.

outputs.name: vibe_url
outputs.description: Your live vibe. Share with care.

outputs.name: vibe_bucket_url
outputs.description: Direct link to your Vibe Bucket for browsing artifacts.
